title: Lesion Tracking
infoText: Track specific lesions over time to detect changes early. The AI will automatically compare new photos with previous ones to identify concerning evolution.

emptyState.title: No Tracked Lesions
emptyState.subtitle: Start tracking specific lesions to monitor changes over time

help.title: How Lesion Tracking Works
help.step1: Create a lesion group to track a specific mole or spot
help.step2: Add analyses to the group over time (weekly, monthly, etc.)
help.step3: AI automatically compares changes in size, color, shape, and symptoms
help.step4: Get alerts for concerning changes or overdue check-ups
